page.title: 20Post Office, Mawdesley
page.content:
The present Post Office was opened in 1975, having previously occupied smaller premises. It is now combined with a large mixed business, dealing in foodstuffs, haberdashery and fancy goods. Approximately 600 people use the separate Post Office facilities. The owners live on the premises, and employ 2 people to help them. _______________________________________
Contributed by D. Parkinson B. V. Garside B.Ed. E. Kazer and children from Eccleston C.P. School E. Greenwood M.A. and children from Mawdesley C.E. School
